item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 1:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Xi has a plan for retaliating against Trump’s gamesmanship
2. ‘There will be a bit of a slump’: London braced for luxury hotel glut
3. Taiwan asks South Korea for help over Chinese ship after subsea cable damaged
4. Austrian chancellor resigns as efforts to exclude far right collapse
5. [Opinion] Why Japan is the perfect place to turn 50
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 1:15 PM UTC
